comps_list.name: SpnRepositoriesScreen.js
comps_list.desc: Page: list all repositories in the account (or displays "no repositories, please add repository")

comps_list.name: SpnRepositoryScreen.js
comps_list.desc: Page: specific repository screen (which displays the editable SpnTreeModelView)

comps_list.name: AppRoutes.js
comps_list.desc: Handles App routing and contains the route map (path to component). Called inside App.js

comps_list.name: SpnDropdownMenu.js
comps_list.desc: Dropdown menu to be displayed when certain items (e.g. support, user) are clicked in SpnTopBar

comps_list.name: SpnRepositoriesScreen.js / SpnNoRepositoriesView
comps_list.desc: Inner component (defined in SpnRepositoriesScreen) which displays "no repositories, add new repository" view

comps_list.name: SpnTopBar.js
comps_list.desc: App top bar (displayed in all the relevant screens)

comps_list.name: SpnTreeModelView.js
comps_list.desc: Spander model view container (contains the tree view and the CLI view)

methods.name: onAddNode(uniqueIndex)
methods.desc: Callback function for the '+' add node button click event

methods.name: setTree(newTreeNodes)
methods.desc: Sets a new JSON tree sturcture to the treeNodes

methods.name: traverseTree(node,callback)
methods.desc: Recursive function that traverses (loops) throygh all the nodes in the tree and sends each node to the custom callback function

methods.name: renderTree(treeNode,level)
methods.desc: Recursive function which renders the whole tree model diagram

methods.name: onSetNodeText(uniqueIndex)
methods.desc: Upon node click this callback opens an Edit Text Box with 'Done' button to set the text for a the specific node

comps_list.name: SpnCLIView.js
comps_list.desc: Spander CLI editor text box view

comps_list.name: SpnReqDescriptionView.js
comps_list.desc: Requirement description view (displayed in the SpnRepositoryScreen)

comps_list.name: SpnRepositoryMembers.js
comps_list.desc: Displays members of a specific repository (displayed in SpnRepositoryScreen)
